deliverables.title: Bridge Construction
deliverables.description: A small cardboard bridge designed to span a gap while supporting significant load.

deliverables.title: Design Explanation
deliverables.description: Explanation of the engineering principles and design choices affecting bridge performance.

deliverables.title: Presentation Document
deliverables.description: A slide deck summarizing the design, construction, testing, and lessons learned.

bundles.label: Person 1
bundles.bundle_summary: Focus on design choices and analytical explanation.

tasks.title: Research Load Distribution
tasks.details: Done when a summary of load distribution principles is documented.

tasks.title: Draft Design Document
tasks.details: Done when a written plan detailing bridge design and materials is completed.

bundles.label: Person 2
bundles.bundle_summary: Hands-on construction and documentation of the process.

tasks.title: Build the Bridge
tasks.details: Done when a functional bridge is constructed according to the design document.

tasks.title: Photograph Construction Process
tasks.details: Done when a series of clear photos documenting each build step is taken.

bundles.label: Person 3
bundles.bundle_summary: Conducts tests and prepares presentation of findings.

tasks.title: Perform Load Tests
tasks.details: Done when the bridge is tested under increasing weight until failure.

tasks.title: Create Presentation Slides
tasks.details: Done when a complete slide deck summarizing the project is created.

assumptions: All materials will be provided as planned.
Team members have equal access to tools needed for construction.
Each member will contribute equally to the workload.
